title: Language and typography
content:
I am a third year Graphic Design student at The Arts Institute at Bournemouth and am looking for some help with regards to my final major project. The brief for this project is as follows:   
   
'Examine through broadcast media the changing role of written language   
within the expanding digital world highlighting its inaccuracies and deviations from the communicative accuracy of the spoken language.'   
   
Although heavily emphasised towards language development another major   
aspect is to highlight the development of the written word into more screen based solutions, in effect type for the screen.   
   
Any ideas, contacts or places to reasearch would be gratefully accepted.
author: joanna
